Package org.jvnet.substance.fonts

Interface Summary
FontPolicy Looks up and returns a FontSet.
FontSet Returns the Fonts used by a Look&Feel or theme.
 

Class Summary
DefaultGnomeFontPolicy The default font policy for Gnome desktops.
DefaultKDEFontPolicy The default font policy for KDE desktops.
DefaultMacFontPolicy The default font policy for Mac desktops.
FontPolicies Provides predefined FontPolicy implementations.
Fonts Provides static access to popular Windows fonts.
FontSets Provides predefined FontSet implementations.
ScaledFontSet Wrapper around the base Substance font set.
SubstanceFontUtilities Font-related utilities.
